option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:background="@color/background_color" tools:context=".PlayersActivity">
<!-- Header with Back Button and Title -->
<!-- Action Buttons Card --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:text="@string/btn_back" android:textColor="@color/primary_color" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:text="@string/players_title" android:textColor="@color/primary_color" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:elevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_add" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:text="@string/btn_add_player" android:textSize="14sp" android:backgroundTint="@color/primary_color" app:cornerRadius="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_clear" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/btn_clear_all" android:textSize="14sp" android:backgroundTint="@color/accent_color" android:textColor="@color/black" app:cornerRadius="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Players List Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:elevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/players_list_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/primary_color" android:padding="16dp" android:background="@color/result_background" />
<!-- Scrollable Players Container --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/players_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Empty state message --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_empty_state" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/no_players_message" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/secondary_text_color" android:gravity="center" android:padding="32dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Top section with Back button --> <RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentStart="true" android:layout_centerVertical="true" android:text="@string/btn_back" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_add" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_centerVertical="true" android:text="@string/btn_add_player" android:backgroundTint="@color/primary_color" />
</RelativeLayout>
<!-- Table section --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Table Header --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@color/material_dynamic_primary10" android:layout_marginBottom="1dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:text="@string/header_name" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1.5" android:text="@string/header_amount" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/btn_edit" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/btn_delete" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Table Content Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/players_table_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
<!-- Bottom section with Clear button --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:gravity="center">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_clear" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btn_clear_all" android:backgroundTint="@color/material_dynamic_tertiary30" android:textColor="@color/material_dynamic_tertiary10" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:hint="@string/hint_player_name">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_edit_player_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:maxLines="1" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/hint_player_amount">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_edit_player_amount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:maxLines="1" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@drawable/table_row_background" android:layout_marginBottom="1dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_player_name" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_player_amount" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1.5" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_update_player" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Edit" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_margin="4dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_delete_player" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Del" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/material_dynamic_error30" android:textColor="@color/material_dynamic_error10" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@drawable/table_row_background" android:layout_marginBottom="1dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_player_name" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_player_amount" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1.5" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_update_player" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/btn_edit" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_margin="4dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_delete_player" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/btn_delete" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/material_dynamic_error30" android:textColor="@color/material_dynamic_error10" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Badminton App Colors --> <color name="primary_color">#4CAF50</color> <color name="primary_dark">#388E3C</color> <color name="accent_color">#FFC107</color> <color name="background_color">#F5F5F5</color> <color name="result_background">#E8F5E8</color> <color name="secondary_text_color">#757575</color> <color name="delete_color">#F44336</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Badminton App Colors --> <color name="primary_color">#4CAF50</color> <color name="primary_dark">#388E3C</color> <color name="accent_color">#FFC107</color> <color name="background_color">#F5F5F5</color> <color name="result_background">#E8F5E8</color> <color name="secondary_text_color">#757575</color> <color name="delete_color">#F44336</color>
<!-- Material3 Error Colors --> <color name="material_dynamic_error30">#F44336</color> <color name="material_dynamic_error10">#FFFFFF</color>
<!-- Material3 Additional Colors --> <color name="material_dynamic_primary10">#E8F5E8</color> <color name="material_dynamic_tertiary30">#FFC107</color> <color name="material_dynamic_tertiary10">#000000</color> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">BMApp</string> <string name="app_title">Badminton Fee Calculator</string> <string name="hint_number_of_players">Number of Players</string> <string name="hint_court_fees">Court Fees ($)</string> <string name="hint_shuttle_fees">Shuttle Fees ($)</string> <string name="btn_calculate">CALCULATE</string> <string name="result_total">Total Amount: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_per_player">Amount per player: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_total_placeholder">Total Amount: $0.00</string> <string name="result_per_player_placeholder">Amount per player: $0.00</string> <string name="error_empty_players">Please enter number of players</string> <string name="error_empty_court_fees">Please enter court fees</string> <string name="error_empty_shuttle_fees">Please enter shuttle fees</string> <string name="error_invalid_players">Number of players must be greater than 0</string> <string name="error_negative_fees">Fees cannot be negative</string> <string name="error_invalid_numbers">Please enter valid numbers</string>
<!-- Players Activity --> <string name="btn_players">PLAYERS</string> <string name="players_title">Players</string> <string name="btn_back">â† Back</string> <string name="btn_add_player">ADD PLAYER</string> <string name="btn_clear_all">CLEAR ALL</string> <string name="players_list_header">Player Payments</string> <string name="no_players_message">No players added yet.\nTap "ADD PLAYER" to get started.</string>
<!-- Add Player Dialog --> <string name="dialog_add_player_title">Add New Player</string> <string name="hint_player_name">Player Name</string> <string name="hint_player_amount">Amount ($)</string> <string name="btn_add">Add</string> <string name="btn_cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="btn_delete">Delete</string>
<!-- Player Validation --> <string name="error_empty_player_name">Please enter player name</string> <string name="error_empty_player_amount">Please enter amount</string> <string name="error_negative_amount">Amount cannot be negative</string> <string name="error_invalid_amount">Please enter a valid amount</string> <string name="error_duplicate_player">Player with this name already exists</string>
<!-- Confirmation Dialogs --> <string name="confirm_delete_title">Delete Player</string> <string name="confirm_delete_message">Are you sure you want to delete %s?</string> <string name="confirm_clear_title">Clear All Players</string> <string name="confirm_clear_message">Are you sure you want to remove all players? This action cannot be undone.</string>
<!-- Messages --> <string name="player_deleted">%s removed successfully</string> <string name="all_players_cleared">All players cleared</string> <string name="no_players_to_clear">No players to clear</string> <string name="amount_format">$%s</string>
<!-- Add this line to fix your specific error --> <string name="btn_clear">Clear</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">BMApp</string> <string name="app_title">Badminton Fee Calculator</string> <string name="hint_number_of_players">Number of Players</string> <string name="hint_court_fees">Court Fees ($)</string> <string name="hint_shuttle_fees">Shuttle Fees ($)</string> <string name="btn_calculate">CALCULATE</string> <string name="result_total">Total Amount: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_per_player">Amount per player: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_total_placeholder">Total Amount: $0.00</string> <string name="result_per_player_placeholder">Amount per player: $0.00</string> <string name="error_empty_players">Please enter number of players</string> <string name="error_empty_court_fees">Please enter court fees</string> <string name="error_empty_shuttle_fees">Please enter shuttle fees</string> <string name="error_invalid_players">Number of players must be greater than 0</string> <string name="error_negative_fees">Fees cannot be negative</string> <string name="error_invalid_numbers">Please enter valid numbers</string>
<!-- Players Activity --> <string name="btn_players">PLAYERS</string> <string name="players_title">Players</string> <string name="btn_back">â† Back</string> <string name="btn_add_player">ADD PLAYER</string> <string name="btn_clear_all">CLEAR ALL</string> <string name="players_list_header">Player Payments</string> <string name="no_players_message">No players added yet.\nTap "ADD PLAYER" to get started.</string>
<!-- Table Headers --> <string name="header_name">Player Name</string> <string name="header_amount">Amount</string> <string name="header_actions">Actions</string>
<!-- Add Player Dialog --> <string name="dialog_add_player_title">Add New Player</string> <string name="dialog_edit_player_title">Edit Player</string> <string name="hint_player_name">Player Name</string> <string name="hint_player_amount">Amount ($)</string> <string name="btn_add">Add</string> <string name="btn_edit">Edit</string> <string name="btn_update">Update</string> <string name="btn_cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="btn_delete">Delete</string>
<!-- Player Validation --> <string name="error_empty_player_name">Please enter player name</string> <string name="error_empty_player_amount">Please enter amount</string> <string name="error_negative_amount">Amount cannot be negative</string> <string name="error_invalid_amount">Please enter a valid amount</string> <string name="error_duplicate_player">Player with this name already exists</string>
<!-- Confirmation Dialogs --> <string name="confirm_delete_title">Delete Player</string> <string name="confirm_delete_message">Are you sure you want to delete %s?</string> <string name="confirm_clear_title">Clear All Players</string> <string name="confirm_clear_message">Are you sure you want to remove all players? This action cannot be undone.</string>
<!-- Messages --> <string name="player_deleted">%s removed successfully</string> <string name="player_updated">%s updated successfully</string> <string name="all_players_cleared">All players cleared</string> <string name="no_players_to_clear">No players to clear</string> <string name="amount_format">$%s</string>
<!-- Add this line to fix your specific error --> <string name="btn_clear">Clear</string> </resources>
